name: Bot Brawlers
description:
Create the ultimate battle bot champion!

Add the parts that you want to your battle bot brawlers.

Fight in close quarters combat in the Arena. Watch out though! There are environmental hazards in the arena.

Attack and move in the arena like the robot championship shows you have seen on TV. This time you get to be the robot fighter!

Start quick matches or invite friends to play against in a 1v1 multi-round brawling mode.
Experience really fast and smooth multiplayer performance even on slow connections.

Add more parts, refine your design, increase your attacking power by test driving it in the arena.

Customizable settings for touch sensitivity, vibration, and overall visual quality.

Enable Augmented Reality mode to place your robot in the real-world!
